original_text:
The nations roar like the roaring of many waters,
    but he will rebuke them, and they will flee far away,
chased like chaff on the mountains before the wind
    and whirling dust before the storm.
korean_text: 열방이 충돌하기를 많은 물이 몰려옴과 같이 하나 주께서 그들을 꾸짖으시리니 그들이 멀리 도망함이 산에서 겨가 바람 앞에 흩어짐 같겠고 폭풍 앞에 떠도는 티끌 같을 것이라

sentences.original_text: The nations roar like the roaring of many waters
and they will flee far away
chased like chaff on the mountains before the wind
sentences.korean_translation: 바람 앞 산 위의 검불처럼 쫓겨

sentences.original_text: and whirling dust before the storm
